Bangladesh: Rule of the Mahmud Shahi dynasty. (to 1324)
Belgium: Guy de Thourout does homage to Guy, Count of Flanders for lands in Wervik, Reninge and Rollegem. He also held land in Menen and Rekkem, a manor in Varsenare, and owned a number of houses within the city of Ypres.
